mapper.select: select u.user_id,u.org_id,u.account,u.password,u.real_name,u.status,u.error_count,u.company_code,e.company_name, o.`status` o_status,u.role_id,r.role_name,r.`status` r_status,e.`status` e_status from ent_user u INNER JOIN ent_organization o on u.org_id=o.org_id INNER JOIN sys_enterprise e on e.company_code=u.company_code LEFT JOIN ent_role r on r.role_id=u.role_id where u.account=#{account} AND u.company_code=#{companyCode}
mapper.update:
update ent_user
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
error_count=error_count+1,
lock_time = now(),
where user_id=#{userId} and status<>2
update ent_user set status =1, error_count=0, lock_time = NULL where user_id=#{userId} AND company_code = #{companyCode}
update ent_user set password =#{newPwd} where user_id=#{userId} AND company_code=#{companyCode}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.sys_menu_code as sysMenuCode,m.icon,m.menu_name,m.menu_type,m.parent_id,IFNULL(m.url,'') url,IFNULL(dp.org_path,'') org_path, IFNULL(dp.is_desensite,0) is_desensite from ent_user u INNER JOIN ent_role r on r.role_id=u.role_id INNER JOIN ent_role_menu rm on u.role_id=rm.role_id INNER JOIN ent_menu m on m.id=rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN ent_user_data_permission dp on dp.menu_id=m.id and u.user_id=dp.user_id where u.user_id=#{userId} and r.`status`=1 and m.`status`=1 AND u.company_code = #{companyCode} and m.sys_code = #{sysCode} ORDER BY m.sequence ASC
mapper.update: update ent_user set latest_ip=#{remoteAddr},latest_time= now() where user_id=#{userId} AND company_code=#{companyCode}
